page.title: 17Tourism in Clawton
page.content: {Tourism}is when people go on holiday to a different part of the country or to a{foreign}country.Most people come to the{South West}of {England}on holiday because of the beaches.Some people come to{Clawton because they would like to stay in a rural area just away from the beach. In Clawton there are two hotels. {They are called Court Barn}and Leworthy farm hotel. Court Barn is on the outskirts of Clawton.It is a large hotel with a large lawn. Leworthy can house{31}people at once.It has several different {nationalities}staying at the moment.Holsworthy Wood attracts some tourists.These are mostly city people who have never come to the{country before.
